item.title: TryHackMe - Break It
item.description: Break It nos trae una serie de retos que vienen en tres fases, la primera codificacion en las distintas bases existentes, la segunda fase una serie de retos relacionado a codificacion y encriptacion en cipher, la tercera face pero no la mas facil una serie de retos de codificacion, encriptacion en cipher y bit shift.
item.content:encoded:
Break It nos trae una serie de retos que vienen en tres fases, la primera codificacion en las distintas bases existentes, la segunda fase una serie de retos relacionado a codificacion y encriptacion en cipher, la tercera face pero no la mas facil una serie de retos de codificacion, encriptacion en cipher y bit shift.

Room

Titulo Break it
Descripción Can you break the code?
Puntos 360
Dificultad Media
Maker

DesKel

Codificacion en Base

Base Ejemplo: “breakit”
Base2 01100010 01110010 01100101 01100001 01101011 01101001 01110100
Base8 142 162 145 141 153 151 164
Base16 62 72 65 61 6b 69 74
Base32 MJZGKYLLNF2A====
Base58 4jP4KDubX1
Base62 22udqyscMu
Base64 YnJlYWtpdA==
Base85 @WH$gCM@k
Base91 %zmfv;:YH

Encriptacion Cipher

Cipher Ejemplo: “breakit”
Caesar Cipher iylhrpa (shift 7)
Vigenere Cipher uyqtrum (key: thm)

Decodificadores

  • Hex Workshop

  • CyberChef

  • dcode

  • cryptii

  • Base85.io

{ Fase 01 - Base }

#1 [Super easy]

Reto

MVQXG6K7MJQXGZJTGI======

Solucion

1
2
3

sckull@uplifted:/media/sckull/Files/tryhackme/BREAKIT$ echo MVQXG6K7MJQXGZJTGI====== | base32 -d
easy_base32
sckull@uplifted:/media/sckull/Files/tryhackme/BREAKIT$

#2[Easy]

Reto

TVJYWEtZVE1NVlBXRVlMVE1WWlE9PT09

Solucion

1
2
3

sckull@uplifted:/media/sckull/Files/tryhackme/BREAKIT$ echo TVJYWEtZVE1NVlBXRVlMVE1WWlE9PT09 | base64 -d| base32 -d
double_bases
sckull@uplifted:/media/sckull/Files/tryhackme/BREAKIT$

#3[Moderate]

Reto

GM4HOU3VHBAW6OKNJJFW6SS2IZ3VAMTYORFDMUC2G44EQULIJI3WIVRUMNCWI6KGK5XEKZDTN5YU2RT2MR3E45KKI5TXSOJTKZJTC4KRKFDWKZTZOF3TORJTGZTXGNKCOE======

Solucion

Base32 > Base58 > Base16 > Base64

[Solucion - CyberChef]

https://gchq.github.io/CyberChef/#recipe=From_Base32('A-Z2-7%3D',true)From_Base58('123456789ABCDEFGHJKLMNPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijkmnopqrstuvwxyz',true)From_Hex('Space')From_Base64('A-Za-z0-9%2B/%3D',true)&input=R000SE9VM1ZIQkFXNk9LTkpKRlc2U1MySVozVkFNVFlPUkZETVVDMkc0NEVRVUxJSkkzV0lWUlVNTkNXSTZLR0s1WEVLWkRUTjVZVTJSVDJNUjNFNDVLS0k1VFhTT0pUS1pKVEM0S1JLRkRXS1pUWk9GM1RPUkpUR1pUWEdOS0NPRT09PT09PQ

#4[Hard]

Reto

HRBUGQDUHFWDIXKUIBWXIJTHIE3DCY3BIE2FKQSZHNDE6MRUIA2TWWDMHRBV2ZKCHQWFCTLPIE2EEJDBIBZCEW3OHUSTOLRCHNFGMVC6IFJXIQ2AHVMVONSBHVOVIM2MHVPV42J4HQVCQ4REIFHVIJ2WHFWDYQSUHROGILJCIFIU23CXHNCEIXK2HRDVSXKOHV2SQJLC

Solucion

Base85 > Base85 > base32 > base85 > base64 > base58 > base85 > base64 > base64

[Solucion - CyberChef]

https://gchq.github.io/CyberChef/#recipe=From_Base85('!-u')From_Base32('A-Z2-7%3D',false)From_Base85('!-u')From_Base64('A-Za-z0-9%2B/%3D',true)From_Base58('123456789ABCDEFGHJKLMNPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijkmnopqrstuvwxyz',false)From_Base85('!-u')From_Base64('A-Za-z0-9%2B/%3D',true)From_Base64('A-Za-z0-9%2B/%3D',true)&input=ODVfY1M3bztaUzg0SFpLOFFcVmM4Tz9LXDhQMnJROE9ZRic2V2wzMzhPWUMoOTJTVms4NTtRQTJHSShMOE81KzI9JyVkYTg1X2NUMTBSPTw4NVdHWDZXP2BVOE9ZQyc3N29zNzhPP1RKNzk7OUA4NiZTZjpKPVlSODU7V0U5aWFWPjhPYzxTOFBxNi84Ni9HYzpKT2hUODYvTWU4UExzNzg2L1BmMWJxWls4NVdEVDspRDA%2BOE9jNk84UDFhPjg0SFpLPV0mKnQ4NWA1UjhQRGBEOE9jOU8xLEQ6Ijg1O05AOFFcVkA4NV9pVjtjbFtnODYuS0U7K2FNTA

#5[Insane]

Reto - Pastebin

Pastebin

Solucion

Base32 > Base85 > Base10 > Base16 > Base91 > Base58 > Base16 > Base64 > Base10 > Base16

[Solucion - CyberChef, dcode.fr]

1- Base32 > Base85 > Base10 > Base16

https://gchq.github.io/CyberChef/#recipe=From_Base32('A-Z2-7%3D',false)From_Base85('!-u')From_Decimal('Space',false)From_Hex('Auto')&

2- Base91



3- Base58 > Base16 > Base64 > Base10 > Base16

https://gchq.github.io/CyberChef/#recipe=From_Base58('123456789ABCDEFGHJKLMNPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijkmnopqrstuvwxyz',false)From_Hex('Space')From_Base64('A-Za-z0-9%2B/%3D',true)From_Decimal('Space',false)From_Hex('Space')&

{ Fase 02 - Base, Cipher }

#1[Easy]

Reto

PJXHQ4S7GEZV6ZTDOZQQ====

Solucion
Base32 > Caesar Cipher (Shift 13) > "make_13_spin"

1- Base32

znxr_13_fcva

2- Caesar Cipher (shift 13)

make_13_spin

#2 [Moderate]

Reto

NjZMKVhATl1EcEI2Jio4Q0xuVy1EZSo5ZkFLV0M6QVUtPFpGQ0InIkReYg==

Solucion
Base64 > Base85 > Vigenere Decode (key: tango)

[Solucion - CyberChef]

https://gchq.github.io/CyberChef/#recipe=From_Base64('A-Za-z0-9%2B/%3D',true)From_Base85('!-u')Vigen%C3%A8re_Decode('tango')&input=TmpaTUtWaEFUbDFFY0VJMkppbzRRMHh1VnkxRVpTbzVaa0ZMVjBNNlFWVXRQRnBHUTBJbklrUmVZZz09

#3 [Hard]

Reto

-!r/X,]n/Z-Zs\X,X$,rI<@]#-9Oh,-=A]R-p9\+

Solucion
Base85 > Rot47 > Base64 > Base32 > Caesar cipher ( shift 13) > qrpbqr_naq_ebg

1- Base85 > Rot47 > Base64 > Base32 (CyberChef)

https://gchq.github.io/CyberChef/#recipe=From_Base85('!-u')ROT47(47)From_Base64('A-Za-z0-9%2B/%3D',true)From_Base32('A-Z2-7%3D',true)&input=LSFyL1gsXW4vWi1ac1xYLFgkLHJJPEBdIy05T2gsLT1BXVItcDlcKw

2- Caesar Cipher (shift 13)

qrpbqr_naq_ebg

#4 [Insane]

Reto - Pastebin

Pastebin

you are a real code cracker

Solucion
Base32 > Base85 > Base91 > Base10 > Base16 > Base64 > Base58 > Vigenere Cipher

1- Base32 > Base85 (CyberChef)

https://gchq.github.io/CyberChef/#recipe=From_Base32('A-Z2-7%3D',true)From_Base85('!-u')&

2- Base91

53 50 32 51 49 32 53 53 32 51 48 32 53 49 32 53 55 32 51 49 32 52 56 32 53 50 32 52 54 32 52 54 32 52 70 32 53 54 32 52 56 32 53 53 32 51 49 32 53 54 32 52 55 32 54 56 32 55 53 32 54 50 32 53 53 32 53 50 32 54 56 32 53 65 32 54 66 32 51 53 32 55 56 32 54 49 32 53 56 32 54 52 32 51 48 32 52 70 32 53 56 32 54 67 32 52 53 32 52 69 32 51 49 32 52 54 32 52 51 32 52 69 32 54 65 32 52 53 32 51 51 32 53 49 32 55 65 32 52 65 32 51 49 32 54 52 32 53 51 32 52 49 32 54 70 32 54 49 32 51 50 32 53 54 32 51 53 32 52 70 32 54 57 32 52 50 32 51 48 32 53 57 32 53 55 32 51 53 32 54 69 32 54 50 32 51 50 32 53 50 32 55 54 32 54 52 32 51 50 32 51 52 32 55 48

3- Base10 > Base16 > Base64 > Base58 - (CyberChef)

https://gchq.github.io/CyberChef/#recipe=From_Decimal('Space',false)From_Hex('Space')From_Base64('A-Za-z0-9%2B/%3D',true)&

4- Vigenere Cipher

roh gfh o nrtl purh qnnvkrx (key: tangodown)

{ Fase 03 - Base, Cipher, Bit Shift }

#1 [Moderate]

Reto

2D 37 2B 19 31 99 31 B3 B2 AB A5 18 32 37 20 B3 B2 AC 2D 1A 31 B4 A1 3A A4 A3 9C B4 AD 36 AC 9E

Solucion

Block Shift Left (1 vez) > Base64 > ROT13

1- Bock Shift Left

2- Base64 > ROT13 (CyberChef)

https://gchq.github.io/CyberChef/#recipe=From_Base64('A-Za-z0-9%2B/%3D',true)ROT13(true,true,13)&input=Wm5WMmMyY2dlV0owZG5BZ2VYWjRjaUJ1SUc5aVptWT0

#2 [Hard]

Reto

19 1A 1C 99 1C 9C A8 38 27 B2 34 27 B9 27 26 28 3C 3B AA 28 A5 AA 2A 29 3C 29 B2 B2 21 B1 AC A6 1C AC 29 A8 38 99 2C

Solucion

Hex Workshop > new > Paste Special > CF_TEXT Marcar 'Interpret as a hexadecimal string' > Rotate to the left 8 bits > Base 58 > Caesar Cipher Shift 14

1- Hex Workshop - Rotate Left 8 bits

2- Base 58

248389QpNehNsNLPxvUPKUTRxReeBcYM8YRQp3X

3- Caesar Cipher Shift 14 (dcode.fr)

fuvsg nevguzrgvp yvxr n obff

#3 [Insane]

Reto

A9 A8 2B EE 2A AA C9 C8 C9 AA A8 0F 2A 8A AA EE A9 8A CA A8 A9 4F 6D 46 E9 A8 A8 0F A9 8A 6D 86 A9 AA A9 26 2A 8A 48 E8

Solucion

Rotate to the left 8 bits (3 veces) > Base64 > Block Shift Left (2 veces) > Base85 > Caesar Cipher (Shift 13)

1- Rotate to the left 8 bits (3 veces)

MEYwQUNFNUExQTUwMTVEMzk2OEExMTk4MUM1QTBG

2- Base64

0F0ACE5A1A5015D3968A11981C5A0F

3- Block Shift Left (2 veces)

<+9hi@WNZ(F`qh<

4- Base85

Tbq bs fuvsf

5- Caesar Cipher (Shift 13)

God of shifs
